verbs.description: foreprize (third-person singular simple present foreprizes, present participle foreprizing, simple past and past participle foreprized)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) To assume, take for granted; to provide for beforehand; to anticipate.
examples: […]  God hath foreprized things of the greatest weight, and hath therein precisely defined, as well that which euery man must performe, as that which no man may attempt  […]
